Name: Circuit Slinger
About the game: Circuit Slinger is a VR rhythm game where players purge corrupted code to a beat. Grab a pair of guns and shoot your way through six levels of heart-pounding electronic music! FEATURES: Shoot dope guns Traverse three virtual landscapes Experience original EDM tracks About the team: Developed by MioMax, a team of 10 SMU Guildhall students over the course of one semester, Circuit Slinger represents the culmination of two years spent in game development. Note: This short game was created by a small student team at SMU Guildhall over a development cycle of 15 weeks. Additional development to extend the game is not currently planned beyond its academic completion. If you have questions regarding this title, please email sstringer@smu.edu.
Meta Title: Circuit Slinger: Jan 1, 2019, MioMax and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Circuit Slinger? Check out the release date (Jan 1, 2019), developer insights from MioMax, and a complete game summary.
